common_2020_mizu_010_mizu_01:
Heya! Step right up! Welcome to the
Cascarrafa Gym![npcn:18]
common_2020_mizu_010_mizu_02:
Vaultin’ Veluza! Look who it is! I was expectin’
someone else![npcn:18]
common_2020_mizu_010_mizu_03: Aha! I see! Ms. Geeta put you up to this, did she?[npcn:18]
common_2020_mizu_010_mizu_04:
It feels like just yesterday that you were out
collectin’ yer badges, and now look at ya—\r
already Champion Rank![npcn:18]
common_2020_mizu_010_mizu_05:
You’re like one o’ those fish Pokémon that
completely changes shape and name as it\r
evolves! All full o’ life. What a great catch![npcn:18]
common_2020_mizu_010_mizu_06:
And now this! Our promising up-and-comer, here
to test my abilities h[im;er:g]self![npcn:18]
common_2020_mizu_010_mizu_07:
Don’t worry—this ol’ man’s used to facin’ harsh
reviewers. Part o’ the restaurant business.[npcn:18]
common_2020_mizu_010_mizu_08:
All righty, then. You ready to battle this ol’ man
and see if he’s still fit to be called Gym Leader?[npcn:18]
common_2020_mizu_010_mizu_retry:
Heya! Step right up! How ’bout it? You ready to
battle this ol’ man?[npcn:18]
common_2020_mizu_010_mizu_09: That’s what I like to hear! Right this way![npcn:18]
common_2020_mizu_010_mizu_10:
Whether it’s gettin’ the freshest ingredients or
the best battle—timin’ is everything! Come back\r
before too long, ya hear?[npcn:18]
